product_name: Grace Digital Audio Eco Extreme Rugged All Terrain Speaker Case
long_description: The Grace Digital Audio Eco Extreme Rugged All Terrain speaker case offers a waterproof, protective shell for an iPhone, iPod Touch, Motorola Droid, Blackberry or other cell phones and MP3 players. Built-in 3 in. speaker is waterproof and provides a full audio range; speaker features 3 watt output and 200Hz - 10KHz frequency response. Universal 0.125 in. headphone jack inside the case connects your device to the speaker. High-impact, shock-resistant design withstands drops and bumps; IPX7 waterproof rating ensures reliable protection from spills. Exterior pressure release valve keeps case watertight but easy to open. Internal storage compartment holds an audio device along with credit cards, drivers license and cash, protecting them from sand, sun, and water. External platform feet let you stand the case up vertically. Detachable carabiner clips easily to a backpack, tent loop or bungee cord. The Grace Digital Audio Eco Extreme Rugged All Terrain speaker case runs on 3 AA batteries (sold separately).
short_description: The Grace Digital Audio Eco Extreme Rugged All Terrain speaker case offers a waterproof, protective shell for an iPhone, iPod Touch, Motorola Droid, Blackberry or other cell phones and MP3 players.
